attributes.action: Plant Fruit Trees on city sidewalks, parks 4 everyone including homeless people.
attributes.additional_details: Plant Various Fruit Tree's on city sidewalks, parks 4 everyone including homeless people could eat all year round.If we planted fruit tress on city sidewalks and in parks their would be enough to help the community as an whole. We really need to start using Government money to benefit the community as a whole.
attributes.background: Government continually are stressing children need to eat more healthily and so do adults, they invest millions of pounds on tick box surveys just to say they are doing something. This would benefit every one in the UK especially Children and homeless people.

rejection.details: Local trees and parks are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament.
